name: Optimum Organization
tag_list: emarketing, development, businesse, ecommerce, education, training, consultation, advices, medium-firms
overview:
Optimum Organization offers responsible and distinctive advices and services to Small and Medium Enterprises (SMEs) in Middle East in order to elevate their business and improve their performance toward greater firms.

Optimum provides a wide range of solutions through its four Business Unites:

  • Technology Solutions: offers information technology professional services in E-Marketing, Web Design, Web Applications, and Mobile Applications.
  • Business Advisory: offers business consultations in Strategic Development, Organizational Excellence, Business Planning, and Launching Management.
  • Operational Excellence: offers services in Product Design and Development, Supply Chain Excellence, Lean Six Sigma, and Quality Management Systems.
  • Talent Development: offers Training Courses and Professional Programs, as well as Training Services in addition to Training-Based Solutions.

Optimum believes that the innovation and knowledge are the driver of the 21st century, represented in both products and services, therefore the attention and methodologies are specified and designed for such future.

Optimum has a proven concept for delivering the different solutions through adoption of optimization approach that take into consideration all project constraints.
